attributes.action: take a more compassionate attitude to the Icelandic debt in accord with British traditions of fairness, and not penalise all Icelanders for the actions of a few individuals without acknowledging the failure of UK regulators to moderate our government's exposure to default
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hope I'm not alone in thinking that this punishment of the Icelandic nation is disproportionate. Let him who is without sin cast the first stone.
